entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:23 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Clear. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
